original_text: He was holding a little scroll, which lay open in his hand. He planted his right foot on the sea and his left foot on the land,
korean_text: 그 손에는 펴 놓인 작은 두루마리를 들고 그 오른 발은 바다를 밟고 왼 발은 땅을 밟고

sentences.original_text: He was holding a little scroll,
which lay open in his hand.
He planted his right foot on the sea
and his left foot on the land,
